pullRequest.title: [WFCORE-4934] Upgrade Undertow to 2.1.0.Final
pullRequest.bodyText:
1.1.x PR: #4168
Jira: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFCORE-4934
    Release Notes - Undertow - Version 2.1.0.Final

        Component Upgrade


[UNDERTOW-1675] -         Upgrade Undertow Dependencies


        Enhancement


[UNDERTOW-649] -         XNIO should only configure the SSLContext and Engine if configuration options are provided.

[UNDERTOW-1672] -         Unable to find the resource: /META-INF/BenchmarkList 

[UNDERTOW-1699] -         Http2ReceiverListener has unused fields

[UNDERTOW-1700] -         Prevent resource leaks when Exchanges arent closed cleanly

[UNDERTOW-1701] -         GracefulShutdownHandler has race condition that results in shutdownComplete not called


        Library Upgrade


[UNDERTOW-1636] -         Upgrade XNIO


        Feature Request


[UNDERTOW-1600] -         Enhance SameSite Cookie support


        Bug


[UNDERTOW-1464] -         Matrix parameters are not properly handled

[UNDERTOW-1671] -         URLUtils.parsePathParam uses '&' as a separator

[UNDERTOW-1677] -         WFLYCLWEBUT0002 error occurs in first cross-context request creating a shared session

[UNDERTOW-1678] -         Some tests do not respect value of 'default.server.address' property

[UNDERTOW-1683] -         UT000146 is improperly thrown

[UNDERTOW-1685] -         Slight test extension for SameSite cookie support


        Task


[UNDERTOW-1684] -         Remove OSGi support


        Sub-task


[UNDERTOW-1673] -         Upgrade XNIO to 3.8.0.Final

[UNDERTOW-1687] -         Temporarily add JBoss Threads dependency to upgrade it to 3.1.0.Final

[UNDERTOW-1688] -         Upgrade H2 Database to 1.4.200

[UNDERTOW-1689] -         Upgrade EasyMock to 4.2

[UNDERTOW-1690] -         Upgrade JUnit to 4.13

[UNDERTOW-1691] -         Upgrade Netty to 4.1.48.Final

[UNDERTOW-1692] -         Upgrade Apache HttpComponents to 4.5.12

[UNDERTOW-1693] -         Upgrade JBoss Logging to 3.4.1.Final

[UNDERTOW-1694] -         Upgrade JBoss Logging Processor to 2.2.1.Final

[UNDERTOW-1695] -         Upgrade JBoss Log Manager to 2.1.14.Final

[UNDERTOW-1696] -         Upgrade JBoss Annotations API to 1.3 2.0.1.Final

[UNDERTOW-1697] -         Upgrade JBoss Servlet API to 2.0.0.Final

[UNDERTOW-1698] -         Upgrade JBoss WebSocket Spec to 2.0.0.Final

nodes.bodyText: @fl4via could you please update your PR with 2.1.0.Final version please? thanks :)

commit.message:
[WFCORE-4934] Upgrade Undertow to 2.1.0.Final

Also, remove old undertow-build-config reference (it is an old module from Undertow 1.x that no longer exists) and add exclusion for new dependencies added to Undertow via Xnio upgrade

Also, remove old undertow-build-config reference (it is an old module from Undertow 1.x that no longer exists) and add exclusion for new dependencies added to Undertow via Xnio upgrade

Also, remove old undertow-build-config reference (it is an old module from Undertow 1.x that no longer exists) and add exclusion for new dependencies added to Undertow via Xnio upgrade
